txt.en: Talk to Aldbéort
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest
The flames at the central farmhouse have been slightly abated
The flames at the south-west farmhouse have been slightly abated
The flames at the north-east farmhouse have been slightly abated
The Enemy is setting the farmhouses of Faldham ablaze.
The flames at the east farmhouse have been slightly abated
The flames at the north farmhouse have been slightly abated
Bring the bucket to a burning building

'It is not enough that they destroy our crops, steal our horses, and kill our warriors, the Enemy is now burning our houses to the ground. Without the farmsteads, we will have nowhere else to go.\n\n'Help us to defend Faldham and carry water to the fires raging through the buildings.'
Burning houses can be found at farmsteads around Faldham.\n\nAldbéort has asked you to aid in the defence of Faldham by bringing water to burning farmsteads.
'Soon we will have to begin replacing the scorched and burnt wood, but for now, the farmsteads stand.'
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear that you helped put out the fires.
'Are you prepared to endure the flames and help defend Faldham?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Bring water to the central farmhouse
Bring water to the south-west farmhouse
Bring water to the north-east farmhouse
Bring water to the east farmhouse
Siege of Faldham: Inferno
Bring water to the north farmhouse
